creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
Stream music that fits the style and space of your business.

Soundtrack picks the music for you, so you can get on with your business. You’ll get an endless music mix based on any genre, energy level, decade, or vibe that you choose. And you can personalize your soundtrack as you go, to really make it match the mood you want in your venue.

Or you can simply pick one of our ready-made soundtracks put together by our music experts.

It’s perfect for anyone who wants to play music in bars, restaurants, shops or in other commercial venues.


Don’t waste valuable time looking for or creating playlists. Simply pick the mood and energy level you want. In seconds, you’ll be playing a soundtrack that’s perfect for your style and space.

Save time
Play music that’s perfect for your venue in just a few clicks

No expertise needed
All you need to know is what mood you want to set

Avoid repetitive playlists
Soundtracks are updated every week with more similar songs

Here’s what people are saying about Soundtrack:

-”One of the best platforms when it comes to streaming music licensing.” -Legis Music

-”The Spotify Of Background Music” -Forbes

Listed by Fast Company as one of the world’s most innovative companies in 2019


Play music on your Android mobile or tablet.

Any question or feedback, contact us on support@soundtrackyourbrand.com
descriptionShort: Background music for business - Just press play

title: Soundtrack Player

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
Stream music that fits the style and space of your business.

Pick from more than 350 curated playlists, tailor the music to your brand with bespoke stations or use one of our artist stations to find the right sound for you.

Schedule music in advance with drag-and-drop simplicity and keep your business family-friendly with an explicit lyrics filter.

Manage everything from anywhere. Soundtrack lets you find and schedule music for all of your locations.

Perfect for anyone who wants to play music in bars, restaurants, shops or in other commercial venues.

Soundtrack is fully licensed, including ASCAP and BMI if you are in the US. All you have to know is what mood you want to set in your venue. In just a few clicks you’ll be playing a dynamic stream of music, powered by machine learning and human curation.
Note that PRO fees are not included outside the US.

Save time
Play music that’s perfect for your venue in just a few clicks

No expertise needed
All you need to know is what mood you want to set

Avoid repetitive music
Our playlists are updated every week with more similar songs

Here’s what people are saying about Soundtrack:

-”One of the best platforms when it comes to streaming music licensing.” -Legis Music

-”The Spotify Of Background Music” -Forbes

Listed by Fast Company as one of the world’s most innovative companies in 2020

Any question or feedback, contact us on support@soundtrackyourbrand.com

title: Soundtrack Player

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
It’s never been easier or more fun to get the perfect music playing in your business, whether you’ve never made a playlist or you’re a serious music fan. And it’s all licensed and legal.

With the world’s largest commercial catalog—51 million songs—you can play the music you want, not what someone tells you to play.


Play whatever you want, whenever you want
No other commercial service lets you do this!
- Simply search by song, artist, or album and create licensed playlists with whatever music you want
- Import playlists from Spotify to instantly make them licensed and legal. Why do the same work twice?
- Customize ready-made playlists and make them your own—a custom sound with an expert’s touch.

Save time with instant music
- Get going in seconds with the 400+ playlists curated around different moods and business types
- Just type your favorite musician’s name to instantly get a station based around that artist’s sound
- Harness the power of AI to create stations around the vibe of your particular business.

Always have the music ready and skip unpleasant surprises
- Schedule music in advance to always have the right music playing when your doors are open, and let staff focus on the customers
- Just flick a switch to keep your business family-friendly with the explicit-lyrics filter
- Keep the music how you want when you control it for one or more locations, adding users and assigning permissions as you see fit

Fully licensed in the US and Canada
- We handle ASCAP+BMI and SOCAN+Re:Sound performance licenses so you don’t have to
- The service pays for itself: you save 21%–90% on the included licenses compared to purchasing them separately

Soundtrack is right for anyone who wants to play music in bars, restaurants, shops, or other commercial venues. To use the app, go to www.soundtrackyourbrand.com and create an account. For countries other than the US and Canada, Soundtrack provides all mechanical and performance licenses, but customers must contact their local PRO for public performance licenses.


What people are saying about Soundtrack

- ”One of the best platforms when it comes to streaming music licensing.” -Legis Music

- ”The Spotify Of Background Music” -Forbes

- Listed by Fast Company as one of the world’s most innovative companies in 2020

Wireless playback through AirPlay and Bluetooth.

Our privacy policy: https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/privacy-policy
Our general terms and conditions: https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/general-terms-and-conditions

Contact us at support@soundtrackyourbrand.com with any questions.
descriptionShort: Stream music that fits the style and space of your business

title: Soundtrack Player

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
58 million songs. 100% legal. Now you can play what you want, when you want.

The world’s biggest catalog of licensed music to play in your business, and the tools to let your brand sing. Go full curator and choose every song, or just press play for stations and ready-made playlists. Centralize your music management with the Soundtrack Player, and enjoy brand-fit music that’s simple, intuitive, adapted to you.

The only music streaming service for businesses where you can select exactly what to play, helping businesses find their sound since 2013. Get the playlists you want, stations and endless streams of music that get curated, revised and refreshed each week. Save time finding music, save money keeping it all legal!

Music streaming for businesses that want it all
• 58 million songs
• 850+ playlists designed for business
• Song-by-song playlist creation
• Import Spotify playlists
• Music-matching stations

The tools to manage your music
• Explicit lyrics filter
• Weekly scheduling
• On demand playback
• Centralized music management
• Play offline

Licensed, legal and simple
• Covers your licenses to stream, store and play any song on demand
• Save up to 90% compared to doing it yourself
• For the US and Canada, Soundtrack covers all licenses you need
• Does not cover public performance licenses in the rest of the world

Brand-fit music should always be this easy. Simple, as fun as personal streaming and always accessible, no matter what kind of music expert you are.

- Ready-made playlists. Hundreds of playlists specially designed for your industry, refreshed every week and long enough to last all day

- Create playlists easily. Import Spotify playlists to keep what works, start from scratch, or let Soundtrack generate stations of matching music

- Personalized recommendations. Artist and song searches include suggested playlists and similar music, ready to save and edit however you want

- On demand playback. Change things up in the moment, or combine playlists together in your schedules for unique combinations

- Soundtrack stations. Unique stations tailored to your customers, built from the genres, energy and sounds that suit your brand

Compatible devices
Available for Android and iOS. Control what’s playing on all your connected devices, easy user management to set permissions and limits, or use our dedicated hardware to keep it simple.

Create a free account to see what brand-fit music’s all about, and enjoy 14 days of Soundtrack’s most premium features.

Privacy policy:
https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/privacy-policy

General terms and conditions:
https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/general-terms-and-conditions

Contact us at support@soundtrackyourbrand.com

The world’s biggest catalog of licensed music to play in your business, and the tools to let your brand sing. Go full curator and choose every song, or just press play for stations and ready-made playlists. Centralize your music management with the Soundtrack Player, and enjoy brand-fit music that’s simple, intuitive, adapted to you.

The only music streaming service for businesses where you can select exactly what to play, helping businesses find their sound since 2013. Get the playlists you want, stations and endless streams of music that get curated, revised and refreshed each week. Save time finding music, save money keeping it all legal!

Music streaming for businesses that want it all
• 58 million songs
• 850+ playlists designed for business
• Song-by-song playlist creation
• Import Spotify playlists
• Music-matching stations

The tools to manage your music
• Explicit lyrics filter
• Weekly scheduling
• On demand playback
• Centralized music management
• Play offline

Licensed, legal and simple
• Covers your licenses to stream, store and play any song on demand
• Save up to 90% compared to doing it yourself
• For the US and Canada, Soundtrack covers all licenses you need
• Does not cover public performance licenses in the rest of the world

Brand-fit music should always be this easy. Simple, as fun as personal streaming and always accessible, no matter what kind of music expert you are.

- Ready-made playlists. Hundreds of playlists specially designed for your industry, refreshed every week and long enough to last all day

- Create playlists easily. Import Spotify playlists to keep what works, start from scratch, or let Soundtrack generate stations of matching music

- Personalized recommendations. Artist and song searches include suggested playlists and similar music, ready to save and edit however you want

- On demand playback. Change things up in the moment, or combine playlists together in your schedules for unique combinations

- Soundtrack stations. Unique stations tailored to your customers, built from the genres, energy and sounds that suit your brand

Compatible devices
Available for Android and iOS. Control what’s playing on all your connected devices, easy user management to set permissions and limits, or use our dedicated hardware to keep it simple.

Create a free account to see what brand-fit music’s all about, and enjoy 14 days of Soundtrack’s most premium features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Lots of nice stuff in this update! For Spotify users, we’ve added synced playlists, so you can keep your imported playlists up to date. Enjoy some good tunes!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve improved the experience when syncing imported Spotify playlists. We’ve also fixed an issue to allow users with "Restricted music selection" to still be able to block songs, along with a bug that prevented the app from returning to the correct view from the background. When assigning music, the playback will start immediately and we’ve also fixed an issue so the player will now correctly stop playing if another app is outputting audio.

title: Soundtrack Player

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
The world’s biggest catalog of licensed music to play in your business, and the tools to let your brand sing. Go full curator and choose every song, or just press play for stations and ready-made playlists. Centralize your music management with the Soundtrack Player, and enjoy brand-fit music that’s simple, intuitive, adapted to you.

The only music streaming service for businesses where you can select exactly what to play, helping businesses find their sound since 2013. Get the playlists you want, stations and endless streams of music that get curated, revised and refreshed each week. Save time finding music, save money keeping it all legal!

Music streaming for businesses that want it all
• 58 million songs
• 850+ playlists designed for business
• Song-by-song playlist creation
• Import Spotify playlists
• Music-matching stations

The tools to manage your music
• Explicit lyrics filter
• Weekly scheduling
• On demand playback
• Centralized music management
• Play offline

Licensed, legal and simple
• Covers your licenses to stream, store and play any song on demand
• Save up to 90% compared to doing it yourself
• For the US and Canada, Soundtrack covers all licenses you need
• Does not cover public performance licenses in the rest of the world

Brand-fit music should always be this easy. Simple, as fun as personal streaming and always accessible, no matter what kind of music expert you are.

- Ready-made playlists. Hundreds of playlists specially designed for your industry, refreshed every week and long enough to last all day

- Create playlists easily. Import Spotify playlists to keep what works, start from scratch, or let Soundtrack generate stations of matching music

- Personalized recommendations. Artist and song searches include suggested playlists and similar music, ready to save and edit however you want

- On demand playback. Change things up in the moment, or combine playlists together in your schedules for unique combinations

- Soundtrack stations. Unique stations tailored to your customers, built from the genres, energy and sounds that suit your brand

Compatible devices
Available for Android and iOS. Control what’s playing on all your connected devices, easy user management to set permissions and limits, or use our dedicated hardware to keep it simple.

Create a free account to see what brand-fit music’s all about, and enjoy 14 days of Soundtrack’s most premium features.

Privacy policy:
https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/privacy-policy

General terms and conditions:
https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/general-terms-and-conditions

Contact us at support@soundtrackyourbrand.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release includes numerous fixes and improvements to the graphical user interface throughout the app. We have also addressed an issue where certain unpairing attempts were failing. Additionally, we have enhanced the player's stability during slow internet connections. Apart from these updates, we recommend tuning in to some of our popular summer playlists, such as Pool Dance Covers, Summer Daze, and Indie Summer. Enjoy!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this release, we have fixed a bug where it was sometimes not possible to interact with text input fields. We’ve also made some general UI improvements. Additionally, we now display the currently connected Bluetooth devices on all platforms. Furthermore, the upcoming schedule name is now visible when it is "up next."

Are you a fan of the band Tinariwen and cool North African guitar sounds? Look no further than our new Desert Blues playlist.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this release, we've made it clearer when your music library is full. We hope this addition will help you manage your library more efficiently.

With summer in full swing and the office a bit quieter, it might be time to explore some of our specially curated music schedules.

"Office Focus" is a cool mix of jazzy beats and dreamy instrumental lounge music to keep the vibe relaxed, yet productive.

Enjoy the tunes!

title: Soundtrack Player

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand

• Weekly scheduling
• On demand playback

• Save up to 90% compared to doing it yourself

Soundtrack: Music for Business
206.0.6

creator: Soundtrack Your Brand
descriptionHtml:
The world’s biggest catalog of licensed music to play in your business, and the tools to let your brand sing. Go full curator and choose every song, or just press play for stations and ready-made playlists. Centralize your music management with the Soundtrack Player, and enjoy brand-fit music that’s simple, intuitive, adapted to you.

The only music streaming service for businesses where you can select exactly what to play, helping businesses find their sound since 2013. Get the playlists you want, stations and endless streams of music that get curated, revised and refreshed each week. Save time finding music, save money keeping it all legal!

Music streaming for businesses that want it all
• 58 million songs
• 850+ playlists designed for business
• Song-by-song playlist creation
• Import Spotify playlists
• Music-matching stations

The tools to manage your music
• Explicit lyrics filter
• Weekly scheduling
• On demand playback
• Centralized music management
• Play offline

Licensed, legal and simple
• Covers your licenses to stream, store and play any song on demand
• Save up to 90% compared to doing it yourself
• For the US and Canada, Soundtrack covers all licenses you need
• Does not cover public performance licenses in the rest of the world

Brand-fit music should always be this easy. Simple, as fun as personal streaming and always accessible, no matter what kind of music expert you are.

- Ready-made playlists. Hundreds of playlists specially designed for your industry, refreshed every week and long enough to last all day

- Create playlists easily. Import Spotify playlists to keep what works, start from scratch, or let Soundtrack generate stations of matching music

- Personalized recommendations. Artist and song searches include suggested playlists and similar music, ready to save and edit however you want

- On demand playback. Change things up in the moment, or combine playlists together in your schedules for unique combinations

- Soundtrack stations. Unique stations tailored to your customers, built from the genres, energy and sounds that suit your brand

Compatible devices
Available for Android and iOS. Control what’s playing on all your connected devices, easy user management to set permissions and limits, or use our dedicated hardware to keep it simple.

Create a free account to see what brand-fit music’s all about, and enjoy 14 days of Soundtrack’s most premium features.

General terms and conditions:
https://www.soundtrackyourbrand.com/legal/general-terms-and-conditions

Contact us at support@soundtrackyourbrand.com
descriptionShort: Stream music that fits the style and space of your business.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We recently updated the look of our app with a brand new font, freshening up your Soundtrack experience!
